248160.name: Stronghold Kingdoms Starter Pack
248160.description:
The Steam Starter Pack is perfect for new players looking to kick start their medieval domination in Stronghold Kingdoms. Whether you mean to farm peacefully, engage in political mind games or seek vengeance on your sworn enemies, this starter pack enables players to gain a vital head start as they reach for the crown. Enjoy nearly a month's worth of Premium Tokens, with access to build queues, Vacation Mode and automated trading, in addition to 15 random packs of strategy cards and 4 exclusive packs to boost your research and other vital areas of gameplay:



Please Note: As with all DLC on Steam and redeemable Stronghold Kingdoms codes, only one Starter Pack can be redeemed per Kingdoms account.
248160.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 土耳其语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
